Text: Oh man, this game sucks soo bad!

I´ll have to say that i´ve played worse.
As i said before it´s not the best game in the world.
So if you don´t like it, Feel free to say whatever the fuck you want.
I for one, think that it´s a pretty decent game.
Have been playing it for a while and the only thing
that´s really annoying is that the dude in the game
doesn´t run very nice, and how much do i care about that? not at-fucking-all.
thx sharing this 2 us.and as y said if y dont like it dont play it. =)
